price: Nyamara abahakanye bari mu bwibone n’ubwigomeke.
arabic: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فِي عِزَّةٖ وَشِقَاقٖ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: bali alladhīna kafarū fī ʿizzatin washiqāqin
